author: anon.
statepreservation: 7 very fragmentary lines, broken off on all sides except the bottom (empty space of 8.2 cm).
lectionalsigns: long horizontal line underneath the text (and part of a drawing?); some kind of accents or separating strokes.
hand: fair-sized, informal, round, upright, markedly bilinear, fairly regular (considering the material used), written with a thick pen by an experienced hand of the "rapid" type, with letters usually well separated, but occasionally linked; no decorations; the lines are closely spaced.
